column5: *Please note: I can only accommodate two-night stays when that is all the calendar will allow. Otherwise, I have a three-night minimum. Thanks!  This spacious, open, modern 2br/2ba condo is fully-furnished with everything you need for a comfortable, memorable stay. Situated on world famous 6th St., it is a short, easy walk to destinations both downtown and on the up-and-coming east-side. Amenities include gated parking for two cars, wifi, cable, coffee maker, and washer/dryer.   Notable local attractions (there is too many to list, but I'll try a few):  Brew and Brew Coffee: 1 block 100 Pizzitas: 1 block Trailer food court: 1 block Shangri La: 1 block East Side Showroom: 2 blocks Buenos Aires Argentinian restaurant: 3 blocks Austin Convention Center: 5 blocks Ciscos Restaurant: 7 blocks Stubb's BBQ: .4mi Plaza Saltillo Station: .5mi Whole Foods: 1mi UT Campus: 1.3mi Auditorium Shores: 2mi Barton Springs: 2.6mi A.B. Intl Airport: 9mi Circuit of the Americas: 12mi  The list could go on forever. Bars and restaurants start one block from the condo in all directions. Anything in the downtown area is easily accessible from here.  I take a lot of pride in my home and I want you to truly enjoy your visit. If you have any questions, please drop me a line.  The price listed includes all applicable taxes and fees  There is a bus stop at the bottom of my building, and the light rail stop is a short 10 minute walk.  Although I have a two-night minimum listed, I can only approve a two-night stay when the calendar only allows for that. Otherwise, I generally require a three night stay. Everything is negotiable, of course.
